transcript: here's an incredibly easy 100 profit upsell that you're probably already doing but not monetizing so if you offer a guarantee of any kind on products or Services you can take a page out of apple Best Buy some of these massive companies and sell the insurance I'm not saying actual formalized insurance but saying that you basically sell your guarantee for five to ten percent of the expensive ticket price you can charge that the benefit of that is that you can basically cover your cost of your salesman commission with the upsell so you basically acquire customers for free
